title: Cardiff Bus workers to march on day of strike action
text:
Unions say over 500 Cardiff Bus workers will be striking in support of a fair pay day tomorrow.
Cardiff Bus has a special timetable in place should the strike go ahead. Credit: cardiffbus.com Unite says workers will march on Wednesday 2nd September from Callaghan Square at 12 noon to the The Hayes in their first day of industrial action.
Cardiff Bus says due to the proposed industrial action a limited service will be in operation, but "remains hopeful this action will be called off."
On its website Cardiff Bus has a special timetable in place should the strike go ahead.
The company says drivers rejected an earlier 5% pay increase.
Last updated Tue 1 Sep 2015 Travel Wales Cardiff
